mapper.insert: INSERT INTO browse_history (user_id, identity_type, goods_id, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{identityType}, #{goodsId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM browse_history WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND identity_type = #{identityType} AND goods_id = #{goodsId}

select.if: SELECT b.id, g.gid goodsId, g.sku_name, g.goods_specification, g.cover_image_uri, g.goods_unit, p.retail_price,b.create_time FROM browse_history b LEFT JOIN cus_customer c ON c.cus_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN gds_goods g ON g.gid = b.goods_id LEFT JOIN gds_goods_price p ON c.store_id = p.store_id AND b.goods_id = p.gid AND p.start_time < NOW() AND (p.end_time IS NULL OR p.end_time > NOW()) WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} AND b.identity_type = #{identityType} ORDER BY b.create_time DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT b.id, g.gid goodsId, g.sku_name, g.goods_specification, g.cover_image_uri, g.goods_unit, p.retail_price,b.create_time FROM browse_history b LEFT JOIN emp_employee c ON c.emp_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN gds_goods g ON g.gid = b.goods_id LEFT JOIN gds_goods_price p ON c.store_id = p.store_id AND b.goods_id = p.gid AND p.start_time < NOW() AND (p.end_time IS NULL OR p.end_time > NOW()) WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} AND b.identity_type = #{identityType} ORDER BY b.create_time DESC LIMIT 20
